## Treatment contrast 処理対比

::: columns

:::: pull-left

- 実験的介入treatmentの効果を，非介入群との比較で検討
  - 実験群 vs 統制群
- 各実験群を同一の統制群と比べる

--

- 例：様々なプライミング効果を，同一の統制群と比べる
    1. 音韻的プライミング
    2. 綴字プライミング
    3. プライミングなし（統制群）

--

  - 対比は次の2つ
      1. 音韻的プライミング vs プライミングなし（統制群）
      2. 綴字プライミング vs プライミングなし（統制群）

::::

:::: pull-right

```{r schema-treatment-contrasts, echo = FALSE}
demoData <- tribble(
  ~priming, ~rt,
  "control", 451,
  "orthographic", 304,
  "phonological", 267
) |>
mutate(
  diff.from.baseline = rt - first(rt),
  diff.from.GM = rt - mean(rt)
)

baseline <- demoData |>
  filter(priming == "control") |>
  dplyr::select(rt) |>
  pull()

label.y <- demoData |>
  filter(
    priming != "control"
  ) |>
  mutate(
    rt = baseline - abs(diff.from.baseline)/2,
    label = c(
      "paste(italic(β)[1], '= orthographic - control')",
      "paste(italic(β)[2], '= phonological - control')"
    )
  )

demoData |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = priming,
      y = rt
    )
  ) +
  geom_col(
    aes(
      fill = priming
    ),
    show.legend = FALSE
  ) +
  scale_colour_manual(
    aesthetics = c("colour", "fill"),
    values = if_else(demoData$priming == "control", "red", "grey")
  ) +
  #### control as intercept
  geom_segment(
    aes(
      x = "control",
      y = 0,
      xend = "control",
      yend = baseline
    ),
    arrow = arrow(
      length = unit(0.1, "inches"),
      ends = "both"
    )#,
    #colour = "red"
  ) +
  geom_label(
    aes(
      x = "control",
      y = baseline/2,
    ),
    parse = TRUE,
    label = "paste(italic(β)[0], '= control')"
  ) +
  #### difference between control and orthographic
  geom_segment(
    aes(
      x = "orthographic",
      y = baseline,
      xend = "orthographic",
      yend = demoData |>
        filter(priming == "orthographic") |>
        dplyr::select(rt) |>
        pull()
    ),
    arrow = arrow(
      length = unit(0.1, "inches"),
      ends = "both"
    ),
    colour = "red",
    size = 0.75
  ) +
  #### difference between control and phonological
  geom_segment(
    aes(
      x = "phonological",
      y = baseline,
      xend = "phonological",
      yend = demoData |>
        filter(priming == "phonological") |>
        dplyr::select(rt) |>
        pull()
    ),
    arrow = arrow(
      length = unit(0.1, "inches"),
      ends = "both"
    ),
    colour = "red",
    size = 0.75
  ) +
  geom_label(
    data = label.y,
    aes(
      x = priming,
      y = rt,
      label = label
    ),
    parse = TRUE
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Priming Type",
    y = "Reaction Time"
  )
```
